name: Find These Hidden Furnishings! Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: My cousin Deb edits books on furniture design.
questions.explanation:
bed.

	My cousin DeB EDits books....

questions.text: Anaztazia told Nico, "UC has a fabulous furniture design program."
My sister Sandra pesters Mom to buy new furniture.
"Rex, may I borrow your car?" Peter asked. "I need to drive to the furniture store."
questions.explanation:
carpet.

	...may I borrow your CAR?" PETer asked....

questions.text: Sipping a nice hot cup of chai, Roslynn wondered what style of furniture to buy.
Reggie and Rita, bleary-eyed from lack of sleep, finally packed up the last of their furniture.
Wade, Skinner, and Henderson own this furniture company.
"Where's my phonebook?" Casey wondered aloud. "I want to hire someone to move my furniture."
questions.explanation:
bookcase & book case.

	...my phoneBOOK?" CASEy wondered....

questions.text: Miranda told Shelby to hush. Elves--shy creatures--were in the midst of furnishing their burrows.
That looks like the kind of furniture that Grandma usually gives to Oliver and Marcy for their wedding anniversaries.
